item.title: Syrian Forces Battle Rebels Outside Government Stronghold
item.description: The rebels have set their sights on the city of Hama, where President Bashar al-Assad’s government has long maintained strength.

item.title: The Last Time Alcohol Poisoned a Defense Nomination
item.description: Pete Hegseth is not the first.
